titleStmt.title: Private Letter: 1887 January: to Wiremu Colenso

sourceDesc.p: ATL Ms-Group-1807; this is a draft with memo to himself to include quotations from Lyra Apostolica in the copy of his “Autobiography” sent to Wiremu.

front.p: 1887 January: to Wiremu ColensoATL Ms-Group-1807; this is a draft with memo to himself to include quotations from Lyra Apostolica in the copy of his “Autobiography” sent to Wiremu.

body.p:
To W Colenso Jr.
of no 8 North Parade
Penzance England
All that is written on the right hand pages in these 2 books (I and II), was sent to Latimer in August 1883: and I have now made this fresh copy specially for you my 2nd. son

also put in to beg. part I
“Did we but see &cLyra Apost. p.33
& in Ms. last 3 lines from p.147, ib.
